title: Astra founders offer to take company private at value of about $30 million
summary: The founders of struggling space company Astra have offered to take the company private at a value of about $30 million, according to a securities filing on Thursday.

title: ESA Signs Agreement for Potential Use of Starlab Space Station
summary:
The European Space Agency has signed a Memorandum of Understanding with Airbus Defence and Space and Voyager Space to explore the potential of European utilization of the Starlab Space Station once the International Space Station is decommissioned. Starlab is a planned commercial space station. The project is led by Airbus and the US-based Voyager Space. […]
The post ESA Signs Agreement for Potential Use of Starlab Space Station appeared first on European Spaceflight.

title: Rocket Lab plans to resume Electron launches in late November
summary: Rocket Lab expects to resume Electron launches in late November after concluding a “largely improbable” combination of events caused the vehicle’s previous launch to fail.

title: Daily Telescope: Zooming in on one of the most iconic night sky sights
summary: It is the most obvious star cluster than can be observed with the naked eye.
